interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Bleed " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " Little Miracles " .

progression.synopsis: Chika returns from her bath. She says that there's something she wants to tell him before they have sex — he guesses what it is. She has a few questions first, including whether or not he will ever hurt her — he says that he can't promise that, but that he will never do it on purpose. She then says that she loves him, and that she wants a response. He gives it, and thinks he means it — albeit not only about her. They then spend the night together.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .15p1.
